DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this project is to develop and pilot test a violence prevention intervention for men and women in treatment for substance use problems.
DOC.brief_title: Developing Violence Prevention Therapy for Substance Abusers
DOC.criteria: Presence of substance use related problems Interpersonal Violence history in the year before recruitment Primary opiate dependence Presence of active psychotic disorder < 18 years of age
DOC.keyword: alcohol, drugs, aggression, substance use disorder treatment
